platform.name: ncrc3.intel
platform.csh: module load git # setenv KMP_STACKSIZE 512m setenv NC_BLKSZ 1M setenv OMP_SCHEDULE "static,1"

experiment.name: cm4p11_$(AWG_VERSION)
experiment.description: Experiment to build executable. See git log for source code provenance.

source.csh: ( cd atmos_shared && git checkout $(AWG_GIT_TAG) ) ( cd atmos_param && git checkout $(AWG_GIT_TAG) )
( cd atmos_drivers && git checkout $(AWG_GIT_TAG) ) ( cd atmos_cubed_sphere && git checkout $(AWG_GIT_TAG) )
( cd ice_sis && git checkout $(AWG_GIT_TAG) ) ( cd ice_param && git checkout $(AWG_GIT_TAG) )

rm -rf ocean_null git clone -b $(MOM6_GIT_TAG) http://gitlab.gfdl.noaa.gov/github_mirror/noaa-gfdl-mom6-examples.git mom6 pushd mom6 git checkout $(MOM6_GIT_TAG) #needed for older git on zeus git submodule init src/MOM6 tools/python/MIDAS git clone --recursive http://gitlab.gfdl.noaa.gov/github_mirror/noaa-gfdl-mom6.git src/MOM6 git submodule update #This gets the right version of submodules popd
pushd mom6 set platform_domain = `perl -T -e "use Net::Domain(hostdomain) ; print hostdomain"` if ("${platform_domain}" == "zeus.fairmont.rdhpcs.noaa.gov") then ln -s /scratch2/portfolios/GFDL/gfdlscr/John.Krasting/pdata/gfdl_O/datasets/ .datasets else ln -s $CDATA/gfdl_O/datasets/ .datasets endif popd
test -e mom6/.datasets if ($status != 0) then echo ""; echo "" ; echo " WARNING: .datasets link in MOM6 examples directory is invalid"; echo ""; echo "" endif

component.name: coupler
component.requires: fms atmos_dyn atmos_phys land_lad2 ice_sis mom6

input.csh:
set domains_stack_size = "2097152"
# Copy AWG ascii input files to GFDL (waiting for FRE to do this for us) if ( $?batch && ! $?FRE_STAGE ) then if ( $?flagOutputXferOn && $?flagOutputPostProcessOn ) then gcp --batch -cd -r --sync $(AWG_INPUT_HOME) gfdl:$(AWG_INPUT_HOME_GFDL)/.. endif endif

set domains_stack_size = "3097152" set do_ocean = "false"
# Copy AWG ascii input files to GFDL (waiting for FRE to do this for us) if ( $?batch && ! $?FRE_STAGE ) then if ( $?flagOutputXferOn && $?flagOutputPostProcessOn ) then gcp --batch -cd -r --sync $(AWG_INPUT_HOME) gfdl:$(AWG_INPUT_HOME_GFDL)/.. endif endif

cd INPUT
# adjustment of dry mass first time only set adjust_dry_mass = `$(AWG_INPUT_HOME)/adjust_dry_mass.csh`
# create dummy MOM6 parameter file touch MOM_input

input.namelist: filename_tails = $nudging_files1 $nudging_files2 $nudging_files3 filename_head = 'INPUT/$nudging_dataset.h'

freq = 1800 u_tau = 21600. v_tau = 21600.
skip_top_v = 2 use_pdep_nudge = .true.

freq = 1800 u_tau = 21600. v_tau = 21600.
skip_top_v = 15 use_pdep_nudge = .true.

freq = 1800 u_tau = 21600. v_tau = 21600.
skip_top_v = 1 use_pdep_nudge = .true.

freq = 1800 u_tau = 21600. v_tau = 21600.
skip_top_v = 9 use_pdep_nudge = .true.

input.csh: # setup for nudging set nudging_files = `$(AWG_INPUT_HOME)/get_nudging_data.pl.v4 -pr --dataset $nudging_dataset --calendar julian --date="$baseDate" --runtime months=$monthslist[$irun] --runtime days=$dayslist[$irun]` if ($status != 0) then echo "ERROR: getting nudging files" exit 1 endif echo $nudging_files set nudging_files1 = ' ' set nudging_files2 = ' ' set nudging_files3 = ' ' # nlines is the number of lines the nudging files will take up in the nml set nlines = 3 set n_nudge = $#nudging_files @ files_per_line = $#nudging_files / $nlines + 1 set n = 1 set m = 1 while ( $n <= $files_per_line ) set nudging_files1 = ($nudging_files1"'$nudging_files[$m]'",) @ n ++ @ m ++ end set n = 1 while ( $m <= $n_nudge && $n <= $files_per_line ) set nudging_files2 = ($nudging_files2"'$nudging_files[$m]'",) @ n ++ @ m ++ end set n = 1 while ( $m <= $n_nudge && $n <= $files_per_line ) set nudging_files3 = ($nudging_files3"'$nudging_files[$m]'",) @ n ++ @ m ++ end

experiment.name: c96L32_am4g10
experiment.description:
AM4 prototype configuration "am4g10" from MDT Atmosphere Working Group. Derived from "am4g7", with radiation bug-fix and updates from David Paynter, New land model from Sergy, re-tuning for 2-hr radiation time-step from Ming Zhao
- c96 horizontal grid with approximately 100km resolution and 32 vertical levels. - Convection based on "double-plume" from Ming Zhao. - Tiedtke cloud scheme
Changes from am4g7: - radiation updates - new land model - 2-hr radiation time step
For more information about AWG configurations, refer to http://cobweb.gfdl.noaa.gov/~cjg/awg

input.namelist: nxblocks = 1 nyblocks = $atm_threads

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 1980,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'julian' dt_atmos = 1800, dt_cpld = 7200, use_lag_fluxes = .true. concurrent = .false. do_ocean = .false. ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads

experiment.name: c96L32_am4g10r8
experiment.description:
AM4 prototype configuration "am4g10" from MDT Atmosphere Working Group. - c96 horizontal grid with approximately 100km resolution and 32 vertical levels. - Convection based on "double-plume" from Ming Zhao. - Tiedtke cloud scheme
Changes from am4g10: - PBL and convection re-tuningradiation updates
For more information about AWG configurations, refer to http://cobweb.gfdl.noaa.gov/~cjg/awg

input.namelist: nxblocks = 1 nyblocks = $atm_threads

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 1980,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'julian' dt_atmos = 1800, dt_cpld = 7200, use_lag_fluxes = .true. concurrent = .false. do_ocean = .false. ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads

experiment.name: c96L48_am4g10r8_fullchem_O3
experiment.description:
AM4 prototype configuration "am4g10" from MDT Atmosphere Working Group.
- c96 horizontal grid with approximately 100km resolution and 48 vertical levels. - Convection based on "double-plume" from Ming Zhao. - Tiedtke cloud scheme
Changes from am4g10: - PBL and convection re-tuning - O3 interacts with radiation - bugfix for BMB emissions of BC and OC in PBL For more information about AWG configurations, refer to http://cobweb.gfdl.noaa.gov/~cjg/awg

input.namelist: nxblocks = 1 nyblocks = $atm_threads

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 1980,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'julian' dt_atmos = 1800, dt_cpld = 7200, use_lag_fluxes = .true. concurrent = .false. do_ocean = .false. ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 2009,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'julian' dt_atmos = 1800, dt_cpld = 7200, use_lag_fluxes = .true. concurrent = .false. do_ocean = .false. ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads

layout = $atm_layout io_layout = $atm_io_layout npx = 97, npy = 97, ntiles = 6, npz = 32, k_split = 1, n_split = 12, a2b_ord = 4, adjust_dry_mass = $adjust_dry_mass, consv_te = 0.7, fill = .true. print_freq = 0, grid_type = 0, nord = 2, dddmp = 0.0, d2_bg = 0.0, d4_bg = 0.15, tau = 0. z_tracer=.false. kord_tm = -10 kord_mt = 10 kord_tr = 10 hord_mt = 10 hord_vt = -10 hord_tm = -10 hord_dp = -10 hord_tr = -8 ncep_ic = .false. nudge = $do_nudge

nudge_ps = .false. nudge_q = .false. nudge_winds = .true. nudge_virt = .false. nudge_hght = .false. kbot_q = 5 time_varying = .true. tau_winds = 21600. tau_virt = 21600. tau_q = 21600. tau_ps = 21600. nudge_debug = .true. input_fname_list = "$CPERM/Huan.Guo/NCEP_2006_Present_6hr/NCEP_fileList_2006_Present.txt" analysis_file_first = $analysis_first analysis_file_last = "NCEP_2011123118.nc"

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 2009,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'julian' dt_atmos = 1800, dt_cpld = 7200, use_lag_fluxes = .true. concurrent = .false. do_ocean = .false. ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads
nxblocks = 1 nyblocks = $atm_threads

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 1980,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'julian' dt_atmos = 1800, dt_cpld = 7200, use_lag_fluxes = .true. concurrent = .false. do_ocean = .false. ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 2009,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'julian' dt_atmos = 1800, dt_cpld = 7200, use_lag_fluxes = .true. concurrent = .false. do_ocean = .false. ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads

experiment.name: c96L32_am4g11r11
experiment.description:
AM4 prototype configuration "am4g11" from MDT Atmosphere Working Group. - c96 horizontal grid with approximately 100km resolution and 32 vertical levels. - Convection based on "double-plume" from Ming Zhao. - Tiedtke cloud scheme
Changes from am4g10: - PBL and convection re-tuning radiation updates - topo-drag replaces mg-drag
For more information about AWG configurations, refer to http://cobweb.gfdl.noaa.gov/~cjg/awg

input.namelist: nxblocks = 1 nyblocks = $atm_threads

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 1980,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'julian' dt_atmos = 1800, dt_cpld = 7200, use_lag_fluxes = .true. concurrent = .false. do_ocean = .false. ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads

experiment.name: c96L32_am4g10r14_2010climo
experiment.description: Same model as c96L32_am4g10, but configuration with present-day climatological SSTs, present-day GHGs and aerosols.

input.namelist: nxblocks = 1 nyblocks = $atm_threads

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 1,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'noleap' dt_atmos = 1800, dt_cpld = 7200, use_lag_fluxes = .true. concurrent = .false. do_ocean = .false. ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads
nxblocks = 1 nyblocks = $atm_threads

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 1,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'noleap' dt_atmos = 1800, dt_cpld = 7200, use_lag_fluxes = .true. concurrent = .false. do_ocean = .false. ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads
nxblocks = 1 nyblocks = $atm_threads

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 1,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'noleap' dt_atmos = 1800, dt_cpld = 7200, use_lag_fluxes = .true. concurrent = .false. do_ocean = .false. ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads

cg_drag_freq = 1800, cg_drag_offset = 0, Bt_0 = 0.004 , Bt_aug= 0.000, Bt_nh= 0.001, Bt_sh= 0.000, Bt_eq= 0.000, Bt_eq_width= 4.0, phi0n = 30., phi0s = -30., dphin = 5.0, dphis = -5.0, dump_flux= .true. dc= 2.4, cmax= 99.6 do_conserve_energy = .true.,
nxblocks = 1 nyblocks = $atm_threads

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 1,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'noleap' dt_atmos = 1800, dt_cpld = 7200, use_lag_fluxes = .true. concurrent = .false. do_ocean = .false. ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads

experiment.name: c96L32_am4b6_DDLite
experiment.description:
AM4 AMIP hybrid configuration, starting from AM4 prototype configuration "am4g5r1" and updating namelist settings using tikal_201403 model "c96L48_am4b2r1" from MDT Atmosphere Working Group.
c96 horizontal grid with approximately 100km resolution and 32 vertical levels. Convection based on hybrid "alternate closure" from Leo Donner
- cloud_generator_nml: overlapLengthScale = 1. (same value as used in tikal_201403 c96L48_am4b2r1) - strat_cloud_nml: aerosol_activation_scheme = "dqa" (default value in strat_cloud/strat_nml.h) - strat_cloud_nml: vfact = 1.1 and further updating namelist settings using tikal_201403 model "c96L48_am4b2r1" from MDT Atmosphere Working Group: - strat_cloud_nml: var_limit = 0.7 - uw_plume_nml: auto_th0 = 1.0e-3 tcrit = -110.0 do_pdfpcp = .true. mp_choice = 1 and with default value used in shallow_cu/uw_conv.F90 for: - uw_closure_nml: do_old_cbmfmax = .true.
For more information about AWG configurations, refer to http://cobweb.gfdl.noaa.gov/~cjg/awg
8-day regression test and 21-year production run experiments used user/wfc/Donner20150727merge

input.namelist: nxblocks = 1 nyblocks = $atm_threads

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 1980,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'julian' dt_atmos = 1800, dt_cpld = 7200, use_lag_fluxes = .true. concurrent = .false. do_ocean = .false. ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads

experiment.name: c96L48_am4b6_DDFull
experiment.description:
AM4 AMIP hybrid configuration, starting from AM4 prototype configuration "c96L48_am4g5r1" and updating namelist settings using tikal_201403 model "c96L48_am4b2r1" from MDT Atmosphere Working Group.
Convection based on activation of Donner Full scheme. The following are the differences in namelist variables between the c96L48_am4g5r1 configuration and this experiment.
- cloud_generator_nml: overlapLengthScale = 1. (same value as used in tikal_201403 c96L48_am4b2r1) - cloud_spec_nml : cloud_type_form = 'stratdeepuw' - donner_deep_nml : do_donner_cape = .true. - donner_deep_nml : do_donner_plume = .true. - donner_deep_nml : do_donner_closure = .true. - donner_deep_nml : do_freezing_for_cape = .false. - donner_deep_nml : do_freezing_for_closure = .false. - donner_deep_nml : EVAP_IN_DOWNDRAFTS = 0.25 - donner_deep_nml : EVAP_IN_ENVIRON = 0.13 - donner_deep_nml : ENTRAINED_INTO_MESO = 0.62 - donner_deep_nml : ANVIL_PRECIP_EFFICIENCY = 0.5 - donner_deep_nml : MESO_UP_EVAP_FRACTION = 0.1 - donner_deep_nml : erat = 1.04, 1.31, 1.62, 1.97, 2.29, 2.86, 4.10 - entrain_nml : convect_shutoff = .true. - entrain_nml : beta_rad = 0.3 - moist_processes_nml: do_donner_deep = .true. - moist_processes_nml: cmt_mass_flux_source='all' - moist_processes_nml: force_donner_moist_conserv = .true. - moist_processes_nml: do_donner_conservation_checks = .true. - moist_processes_nml: do_limit_donner = .true. - moist_processes_nml: limit_conv_cloud_frac = .true. - moist_processes_nml: do_donner_before_uw = .true. - moist_processes_nml: do_donner_mca = .false. - moist_processes_nml: include_donmca_in_cosp = .false. - strat_cloud_nml : rthresh = 10.0 - strat_cloud_nml : eros_scale = 1.e-7 - strat_cloud_nml : eros_scale_c = 3.e-6 - strat_cloud_nml : eros_scale_t = 3.e-7 - strat_cloud_nml : vfact = 0.8 - strat_cloud_nml : var_limit = 0.7 - strat_cloud_nml : aerosol_activation_scheme = "dqa" - uw_closure_nml : do_old_cbmfmax = .true. - uw_conv_nml : rkm_sh = 5.7 - uw_conv_nml : gama = 0.0 - uw_conv_nml : lochoice = 0 - uw_conv_nml : do_deep = .false. - uw_conv_nml : idpchoice = 1 - uw_plume_nml : auto_th0 = 0.5e-3, - uw_plume_nml : tcrit = -110.0 - uw_plume_nml : do_pdfpcp= .true. - uw_plume_nml : mp_choice = 1
For more information about AWG configurations, refer to http://cobweb.gfdl.noaa.gov/~cjg/awg

input.namelist: nxblocks = 1 nyblocks = $atm_threads

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 1980,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'julian' dt_atmos = 1800, dt_cpld = 7200, use_lag_fluxes = .true. concurrent = .false. do_ocean = .false. ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads

experiment.name: c192L32_am4g11
experiment.description:
AM4 prototype configuration "am4g10" from MDT Atmosphere Working Group. Derived from "am4g7", with radiation bug-fix and updates from David Paynter, New land model from Sergy, re-tuning for 2-hr radiation time-step from Ming Zhao
- c192 horizontal grid with approximately 50km resolution and 32 vertical levels. - Convection based on "double-plume" from Ming Zhao. - Tiedtke cloud scheme
Changes from am4g7: - radiation updates - new land model - 2-hr radiation time step
For more information about AWG configurations, refer to http://cobweb.gfdl.noaa.gov/~cjg/awg

input.namelist: nxblocks = 1 nyblocks = $atm_threads

months = $months, days = $days, current_date = 1980,1,1,0,0,0, calendar = 'julian' dt_atmos = 1200, dt_cpld = 7200, use_lag_fluxes = .true. concurrent = .false. do_ocean = .false. ocean_npes = $ocn_ranks atmos_npes = $atm_ranks atmos_nthreads = $atm_threads
